org.sindice.siren.search.node

Enum NodeBooleanClause.Occur

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<NodeBooleanClause.Occur>
      • org.sindice.siren.search.node.NodeBooleanClause.Occur
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<NodeBooleanClause.Occur>
    Enclosing class:
    NodeBooleanClause

    public static enum NodeBooleanClause.Occur
extends Enum<NodeBooleanClause.Occur>
    Specifies how clauses are to occur in matching documents.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      MUST
      Use this operator for clauses that must appear in the matching documents.
      MUST_NOT
      Use this operator for clauses that must not appear in the matching documents.
      SHOULD
      Use this operator for clauses that should appear in the matching documents.

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • MUST

        public static final NodeBooleanClause.Occur MUST
        Use this operator for clauses that must appear in the matching documents.

      • SHOULD

        public static final NodeBooleanClause.Occur SHOULD
        Use this operator for clauses that should appear in the matching documents. For a BooleanQuery with no MUST clauses one or more SHOULD clauses must match a document for the BooleanQuery to match.
        See Also:
        BooleanQuery.setMinimumNumberShouldMatch(int)

      • MUST_NOT

        public static final NodeBooleanClause.Occur MUST_NOT
        Use this operator for clauses that must not appear in the matching documents. Note that it is not possible to search for queries that only consist of a MUST_NOT clause.

    • Method Detail

        public static NodeBooleanClause.Occur[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (NodeBooleanClause.Occur c : NodeBooleanClause.Occur.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
